  • About

    Welcome to my Website

    I am an Assistant Professor at the Faculty of Software Engineer at the University of Brasília (UnB), where I also serve as one of the coordinators of the LAPPIS research group. I have a diverse range of interests in Software Engineering, including DevOps, Agile, human aspects of software development, Machine Learning, and Open Source software.

    Additionally, I am a co-founder of the Big Open Source Siblings(BOSS), a mentorship program aimed at introducing underrepresented groups to Open Source contribution. Through my research projects in collaboration with government agencies and private companies, I have supervised over 50 scholarship students, applying DevOps/MLOps best practices and automation to develop open source solutions.

    If you’re a student seeking an advisor, a researcher with overlapping interests, or a practitioner looking for innovative project collaboration, I am always open to new collaborations. You can reach me at caguiarignorethis@unb.br.
